scripts.build: mkdir -p static/js && cp node_modules/global-nav/dist/index.js static/js/global-nav.js && cp node_modules/cookie-policy/build/js/cookie-policy.js static/js/cookie-policy.js && yarn run build-css
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path node_modules static/sass --output static/css && postcss --use autoprefixer --replace 'static/css/**/*.css' && postcss --use cssnano --dir static/minified 'static/css/**/*.css' && cp node_modules/cookie-policy/build/css/cookie-policy.css static/css/cookie-policy.css
